ModInfo.description:
Siege and related Promotions get Attack Bonus against Forts and Settlements but reduced Bonus vs plain Urban Tiles.
(Siege-related Attack Bonuses: new values [original]) Besieger*: +25% Urban, +25% Fort [+25% Urban] Besieger_all: +10% Urban, +10% Fort [+10% Urban] Siege: +25% Settlement, +25% Urban, +50% Fort, +20% Garrison/Stronghold/Citadel [+50% Urban] Assault: +25% Settlement, +25% Urban, +25% Fort, +20% Garrison/Stronghold/Citadel [+50% Urban, +50% Fort] *Besieger is no longer available for Siege Units
(this is also part of FimMod)
